smile.feature

Interface FeatureTransform

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MaxAbsScaler, Normalizer, RobustStandardizer, Scaler, Standardizer, WinsorScaler

    public interface FeatureTransform
extends java.io.Serializable
    Feature transformation. In general, learning algorithms benefit from standardization of the data set. If some outliers are present in the set, robust transformers are more appropriate.
